EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =349.4?
EVJ.A: At X =349.4,the label with the highest density is {Potatoes}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Soybeans or Oats?
NC.A: {Soybeans} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Wheat or Barley?
NC.A: {Wheat} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Soybeans}
